description.displayText: Caroline has worked for us since January 2016. Our 6 year old loves her.  She picks him up from school and takes him to his after school activities. When they return home, she makes him dinner or snack and plays games with him. On days when he doesn't have activities, they go on adventures.  When they are at home, she also helps out with our 2.5 year old, who also loves her.   We are very happy to have found her!
description.originalText: Caroline has worked for us since January 2016. Our 6 year old loves her.  She picks him up from school and takes him to his after school activities. When they return home, she makes him dinner or snack and plays games with him. On days when he doesn't have activities, they go on adventures.  When they are at home, she also helps out with our 2.5 year old, who also loves her.   We are very happy to have found her!

description.displayText: Beyond her obvious wit, charm and charisma, Caroline has integrity and humor to boot. You can count on her to come on-time and be prepared and smiling. She's a string listed as well as speaker with a knack for developing relationships and following through. You cannot go wrong with Caroline.
